content.text: By using our website, you agree to the following terms of use, which constitute an agreement between Baby-Dev and you.
We may change these terms from time to time. You may view the most current version through the link that appears on the bottom of all pages on our website.

Baby-Dev owns the information on this website. The entire contents and design of this site are protected under the U.S. and international copyright laws. You may look at our website online, download information to your computer to read later, or print copies of pages for yourself, your family, or your friends. However, you must not remove any copyright notices from our materials. We reserve all other rights, which means that you must not sell our information, rewrite or modify it, redistribute it, use it on your own website, or use it for any other commercial purpose without our prior written permission.

Baby-Dev controls our websites from our location in Sammamish, Washington, USA. By accessing our websites, regardless of where you are located, you agree that the statutes and laws of the Commonwealth of Washington will apply to all matters regarding the use of our websites.

By accessing our website, you agree with these terms and conditions. We reserve the right to change the terms and conditions when necessary, and your continuing use of our website constitutes your acceptance of and agreement to any changes.
